00020 CMap::CMap():
00021 m_width(0), m_height(0),
00022 m_worldmap(false),
00023 m_animation_enabled(true),
00024 m_Dark(false),
00025 m_Difficulty(1),
00026 m_PlatExtending(false),
00027 mp_scrollsurface(NULL),
00028 m_Tilemaps(g_pGfxEngine->getTileMaps()),
00029 m_animtiletimer(0),
00030 m_Background(false)
00031 {
00032  m_Level = 0;
00033  resetScrolls();
00034  memset(m_objectlayer, 0, sizeof(m_objectlayer));
00035 }

00050 /**
00051  * \brief Create an empty data plane used for the map data
00052  * \param blocksize size in bytes of the datablock that has to be created
00053  */
00054 bool CMap::createEmptyDataPlane(size_t plane, size_t blocksize)
00055 {
00056  if(!blocksize) return false;
00057 
00058  m_Plane[plane].createDataMap(blocksize, m_width, m_height);
00059  m_Background = (m_Plane[0].getMapDataPtr() != NULL);
00060 
00061  return true;
00062 }
00063 
00064 void CMap::resetScrolls()
00065 {
00066  m_scrollx = m_scrolly = 0;
00067 
00068  m_scrollx_buf = m_scrolly_buf = 0;
00069 
00070  m_scrollpix = m_scrollpixy = 0;
00071  m_mapx = m_mapy = 0;           // map X location shown at scrollbuffer row 0
00072  m_mapxstripepos = m_mapystripepos = 0;  // X pixel position of next stripe row
00073 }

00078 // returns the tile which is set at the given coordinates
00079 Uint16 CMap::at(Uint16 x, Uint16 y, Uint16 t)
00080 {
00081  if(x < m_width && y < m_height )
00082  {
00083   return m_Plane[t].getMapDataAt(x,y);
00084  }
00085  else
00086   return 0;
00087 }

00092 { return m_objectlayer[x][y]; }

00114 // searches the map's object layer for object OBJ.
00115 // if it is found returns nonzero and places the
00116 // coordinates of the first occurance of the object
00117 // in (xout,yout)
00118 bool CMap::findObject(unsigned int obj, int *xout, int *yout)
00119 {
00120  unsigned int x,y;
00121  
00122  for(y=2;y<m_height-2;y++)
00123  {
00124   for(x=2;x<m_width-2;x++)
00125   {
00126    if (m_objectlayer[x][y]==obj)
00127    {
00128     *xout = x;
00129     *yout = y;
00130     return true;
00131    }
00132   }
00133  }
00134  return false;
00135 }
00136 
00137 // searches the map's tile layer for tile TILE.
00138 // if it is found returns nonzero and places the
00139 // coordinates of the first occurance of the tile
00140 // in (xout,yout)
00141 bool CMap::findTile(unsigned int tile, int *xout, int *yout, int plane)
00142 {
00143  unsigned int x,y;
00144 
00145  for(y=2;y<m_height-2;y++)
00146  {
00147   for(x=2;x<m_width-2;x++)
00148   {
00149    if (m_Plane[plane].getMapDataAt(x,y)==tile)
00150    {
00151     *xout = x;
00152     *yout = y;
00153     return true;
00154    }
00155   }
00156  }
00157  return false;
00158 }
00159 
00160 bool CMap::setTile(Uint16 x, Uint16 y, Uint16 t, Uint16 plane)
00161 {
00162  if( x<m_width && y<m_height )
00163  {
00164   //mp_foreground_data[y*m_width + x] = t;
00165   m_Plane[plane].setMapDataAt(t, x, y);
00166   return true;
00167  }
00168  else
00169   return false;
00170 }
00171 
00172 bool CMap::setTile(Uint16 x, Uint16 y, Uint16 t, bool update, Uint16 plane)
00173 {
00174  if(setTile( x, y, t, plane))
00175  {
00176   if( update )
00177   {
00178    redrawAt(x,y);
00179   }
00180   return true;
00181  }
00182  else return false;
00183 }
00184 
00185 // Called in level. This function does the same as setTile, but also draws directly to the scrollsurface
00186 // used normally, when items are picked up
00187 bool CMap::changeTile(Uint16 x, Uint16 y, Uint16 t)
00188 {
00189  if( setTile( x, y, t ) )
00190  {
00191   m_Tilemaps.at(1).drawTile(mp_scrollsurface, (x<<4)&511, (y<<4)&511, t);
00192   return true;
00193  }
00194  return false;
00195 }

00198 /**
00199  * \brief here we removed some unwanted borders in Y-direction in case of getting them when using a
00200  *     higher screenspace in Y-direction, than the original used to..
00201  */
00202 void CMap::changeTileArrayY(Uint16 x, Uint16 y, Uint16 h, Uint16 tile)
00203 {
00204  SDL_Rect gameres = g_pVideoDriver->getGameResolution();
00205  const Uint16 x2 = x+gameres.w/16;
00206  const Uint16 y2 = y+h;
00207 
00208  for(Uint16 c_y=y ; c_y<y2 ; c_y++)
00209   for(Uint16 c_x=x ; c_x<x2 ; c_x++)
00210    changeTile(c_x, c_y, tile);
00211 }
00212 
00213 ////
00214 // Scrolling Routines
00215 ////
00216 bool CMap::gotoPos(int x, int y)
00217 {
00218  int dx,dy;
00219  bool retval = false;
00220  dx = x - m_scrollx;
00221  dy = y - m_scrolly;
00222  
00223  if( dx > 0 )
00224   for( int scrollx=0 ; scrollx<dx ; scrollx++) scrollRight();
00225  else retval = true;
00226  
00227  if( dx < 0 )
00228   for( int scrollx=0 ; scrollx<-dx ; scrollx++) scrollLeft();
00229  else retval = true;
00230  
00231  if( dy > 0 )
00232   for( int scrolly=0 ; scrolly<dy ; scrolly++) scrollDown();
00233  else retval = true;
00234  
00235  if( dy < 0 )
00236   for( int scrolly=0 ; scrolly<-dy ; scrolly++) scrollUp();
00237  else retval = true;
00238 
00239  return retval;
00240 }
00241 
00242 // scrolls the map one pixel right
00243 void CMap::scrollRight(void)
00244 {
00245  if(m_scrollx < (m_width<<4) - g_pVideoDriver->getGameResolution().w)
00246  {
00247   m_scrollx++;
00248   m_scrollx_buf = m_scrollx&511;
00249 
00250   m_scrollpix++;
00251   if (m_scrollpix>=16)
00252   {  // need to draw a new stripe
00253    drawVstripe(m_mapxstripepos, m_mapx + 32);
00254    m_mapx++;
00255    m_mapxstripepos += 16;
00256    if (m_mapxstripepos >= 512) m_mapxstripepos = 0;
00257    m_scrollpix = 0;
00258   }
00259  }
00260 }
00261 
00262 // scrolls the map one pixel left
00263 void CMap::scrollLeft(void)
00264 {
00265  if(m_scrollx>0)
00266  {
00267   m_scrollx--;
00268   m_scrollx_buf = m_scrollx&511;
00269 
00270   if (m_scrollpix==0)
00271   {  // need to draw a new stripe
00272    if(m_mapx>0) m_mapx--;
00273    if (m_mapxstripepos == 0)
00274    {
00275     m_mapxstripepos = (512 - 16);
00276    }
00277    else
00278    {
00279     m_mapxstripepos -= 16;
00280    }
00281    drawVstripe(m_mapxstripepos, m_mapx);
00282 
00283    m_scrollpix = 15;
00284   } else m_scrollpix--;
00285  }
00286 }
00287 
00288 void CMap::scrollDown(void)
00289 {
00290  if(m_scrolly < (m_height<<4) - g_pVideoDriver->getGameResolution().h )
00291  {
00292   m_scrolly++;
00293   m_scrolly_buf = m_scrolly&511;
00294 
00295   m_scrollpixy++;
00296   if (m_scrollpixy>=16)
00297   {  // need to draw a new stripe
00298    drawHstripe(m_mapystripepos, m_mapy + 32);
00299    m_mapy++;
00300    m_mapystripepos += 16;
00301    if (m_mapystripepos >= 512) m_mapystripepos = 0;
00302    m_scrollpixy = 0;
00303   }
00304  }
00305 }
00306 
00307 void CMap::scrollUp(void)
00308 {
00309  if(m_scrolly>0)
00310  {
00311   m_scrolly--;
00312   m_scrolly_buf = m_scrolly&511;
00313 
00314   if (m_scrollpixy==0)
00315   {  // need to draw a new stripe
00316    if(m_mapy>0) m_mapy--;
00317    if (m_mapystripepos == 0)
00318    {
00319     m_mapystripepos = (512 - 16);
00320    }
00321    else
00322    {
00323     m_mapystripepos -= 16;
00324    }
00325    drawHstripe(m_mapystripepos, m_mapy);
00326 
00327    m_scrollpixy = 15;
00328   } else m_scrollpixy--;
00329  }
00330 }
00331 
00332 //////////////////////
00333 // Drawing Routines //
00334 //////////////////////
00335 // Draws the entire map to the scroll buffer
00336 // called at start of level to draw the upper-left corner of the map
00337 // onto the scrollbuffer...from then on the map will only be drawn
00338 // in stripes as it scrolls around.
00339 // TODO: This function has a mayor problem! It only works, when tile same on the screen
00340 // are changed. In Vorticons this might be the case. In Galaxy it's different!
00341 void CMap::redrawAt(int mx, int my)
00342 {
00343  // Go throught the list and just draw all the tiles that need to be animated
00344  const Uint32 num_h_tiles = mp_scrollsurface->h/16;
00345  const Uint32 num_v_tiles = mp_scrollsurface->w/16;
00346 
00347  if(  mx >= m_mapx && my >= m_mapy &&
00348    mx < m_mapx + num_v_tiles && my < m_mapy + num_h_tiles   )
00349  {
00350   const Uint16 loc_x = (((mx-m_mapx)<<4)+m_mapxstripepos)&511;
00351   const Uint16 loc_y = (((my-m_mapy)<<4)+m_mapystripepos)&511;
00352 
00353   if( m_Background )
00354   {
00355    size_t bg = m_Plane[0].getMapDataAt(mx, my);
00356    size_t fg = m_Plane[1].getMapDataAt(mx, my);
00357 
00358 
00359    m_Tilemaps.at(0).drawTile(mp_scrollsurface, loc_x, loc_y, bg);
00360    if(fg)
00361     m_Tilemaps.at(1).drawTile(mp_scrollsurface, loc_x, loc_y, fg);
00362   }
00363   else
00364   {
00365    size_t fg = m_Plane[1].getMapDataAt(mx, my);
00366    m_Tilemaps.at(1).drawTile(mp_scrollsurface, loc_x, loc_y, fg);
00367   }
00368  }
00369 }
00370 
00371 // draws all the map area. This is used for the title screen, when game starts and other passive scenes.
00372 // Don't use it, when the game is scrolling. Use redrawAt instead,
00373 // for the correct and fast update of tiles or
00374 void CMap::drawAll()
00375 {
00376  Uint32 num_h_tiles = mp_scrollsurface->h/16;
00377  Uint32 num_v_tiles = mp_scrollsurface->w/16;
00378 
00379  if(num_v_tiles+m_mapx >= m_width)
00380   num_v_tiles = m_width-m_mapx;
00381 
00382  if(num_h_tiles+m_mapy >= m_height)
00383   num_h_tiles = m_height-m_mapy;
00384 
00385  if( m_Background )
00386  {
00387   for(Uint32 y=0;y<num_h_tiles;y++)
00388   {
00389    for(Uint32 x=0;x<num_v_tiles;x++)
00390    {
00391     Uint32 bg = m_Plane[0].getMapDataAt(x+m_mapx, y+m_mapy);
00392     Uint32 fg = m_Plane[1].getMapDataAt(x+m_mapx, y+m_mapy);
00393 
00394     m_Tilemaps.at(0).drawTile(mp_scrollsurface, ((x<<4)+m_mapxstripepos)&511,((y<<4)+m_mapystripepos)&511, bg);
00395     if(fg)
00396      m_Tilemaps.at(1).drawTile(mp_scrollsurface, ((x<<4)+m_mapxstripepos)&511,((y<<4)+m_mapystripepos)&511, fg);
00397    }
00398   }
00399  }
00400  else
00401  {
00402   for(Uint32 y=0;y<num_h_tiles;y++)
00403   {
00404    for(Uint32 x=0;x<num_v_tiles;x++)
00405    {
00406     Uint32 fg = m_Plane[1].getMapDataAt(x+m_mapx, y+m_mapy);
00407     m_Tilemaps.at(1).drawTile(mp_scrollsurface, ((x<<4)+m_mapxstripepos)&511,((y<<4)+m_mapystripepos)&511, fg);
00408    }
00409   }
00410  }
00411 }
00412 
00413 // draw a horizontal stripe, for vertical scrolling
00414 void CMap::drawHstripe(unsigned int y, unsigned int mpy)
00415 {
00416  if(mpy >= m_height) return;
00417  Uint32 num_v_tiles= mp_scrollsurface->w/16;
00418  
00419  if( num_v_tiles+m_mapx >= m_width )
00420   num_v_tiles = m_width-m_mapx;
00421 
00422  if( m_Background )
00423  {
00424   for(Uint32 x=0;x<num_v_tiles;x++)
00425   {
00426    Uint32 bg = m_Plane[0].getMapDataAt(x+m_mapx, mpy);
00427    Uint32 fg = m_Plane[1].getMapDataAt(x+m_mapx, mpy);
00428 
00429    m_Tilemaps.at(0).drawTile(mp_scrollsurface, ((x<<4)+m_mapxstripepos)&511, y, bg);
00430    if(fg)
00431     m_Tilemaps.at(1).drawTile(mp_scrollsurface, ((x<<4)+m_mapxstripepos)&511, y, fg);
00432   }
00433  }
00434  else
00435  {
00436   for(Uint32 x=0;x<num_v_tiles;x++)
00437   {
00438    Uint32 fg = m_Plane[1].getMapDataAt(x+m_mapx, mpy);
00439    m_Tilemaps.at(1).drawTile(mp_scrollsurface, ((x<<4)+m_mapxstripepos)&511, y, fg);
00440   }
00441  }
00442 }
00443 
00444 // draws a vertical stripe from map position mapx to scrollbuffer position x
00445 void CMap::drawVstripe(unsigned int x, unsigned int mpx)
00446 {
00447  if(mpx >= m_width) return;
00448 
00449  Uint32 num_h_tiles= mp_scrollsurface->h/16;
00450 
00451  if( num_h_tiles+m_mapy >= m_height )
00452   num_h_tiles = m_height-m_mapy;
00453 
00454  if( m_Background )
00455  {
00456   for(Uint32 y=0;y<num_h_tiles;y++)
00457   {
00458    Uint32 bg = m_Plane[0].getMapDataAt(mpx, y+m_mapy);
00459    Uint32 fg = m_Plane[1].getMapDataAt(mpx, y+m_mapy);
00460 
00461    m_Tilemaps.at(0).drawTile(mp_scrollsurface, x, ((y<<4)+m_mapystripepos)&511, bg);
00462    if(fg)
00463     m_Tilemaps.at(1).drawTile(mp_scrollsurface, x, ((y<<4)+m_mapystripepos)&511, fg);
00464   }
00465  }
00466  else
00467  {
00468   for(Uint32 y=0;y<num_h_tiles;y++)
00469   {
00470    Uint32 fg = m_Plane[1].getMapDataAt(mpx, y+m_mapy);
00471    m_Tilemaps.at(1).drawTile(mp_scrollsurface, x, ((y<<4)+m_mapystripepos)&511, fg);
00472   }
00473  }
00474 }
00475 
00476 /**
00477  * \brief This function draws all the masked and foreground tiles
00478  */
00479 void CMap::drawForegroundTiles()
00480 {
00481  SDL_Surface* surface = g_pVideoDriver->getBlitSurface();
00482  const Uint16 num_h_tiles = surface->h;
00483  const Uint16 num_v_tiles = surface->w;
00484  const Uint16 x1 = m_scrollx>>TILE_S;
00485  const Uint16 y1 = m_scrolly>>TILE_S;
00486  const Uint16 x2 = (m_scrollx+num_v_tiles)>>TILE_S;
00487  const Uint16 y2 = (m_scrolly+num_h_tiles)>>TILE_S;
00488 
00489  std::vector<CTileProperties> &TileProperties =
00490    g_pBehaviorEngine->getTileProperties(1);
00491  for( size_t y=y1 ; y<=y2 ; y++)
00492  {
00493   for( size_t x=x1 ; x<=x2 ; x++)
00494   {
00495    Uint16 fg = m_Plane[1].getMapDataAt(x,y);
00496 
00497    const Uint16 loc_x = (x<<TILE_S)-m_scrollx;
00498    const Uint16 loc_y = (y<<TILE_S)-m_scrolly;
00499 
00500    if(!m_Background)
00501    {
00502        if(TileProperties[fg].behaviour == -2) // case when when has a masked graphic
00503         drawAnimatedTile(surface, loc_x, loc_y, fg+1);
00504        else if (TileProperties[fg].behaviour == -1) // case when tile is just foreground
00505         drawAnimatedTile(surface, loc_x, loc_y, fg);
00506    }
00507    else if(fg != 0)
00508    {
00509     if(TileProperties[fg].behaviour < 0)
00510      drawAnimatedTile(surface, loc_x, loc_y, fg);
00511    }
00512   }
00513  }
00514 }
00515 
00516 /////////////////////////
00517 // Animation functions //
00518 /////////////////////////
00519 // searches for animated tiles at the map position (X,Y) and
00520 // unregisters them from animtiles
00521 // Draw an animated tile. If it's not animated draw it anyway
00522 
00523 Uint8 CMap::getAnimtiletimer()
00524 { return m_animtiletimer; }
00525 
00526 void CMap::drawAnimatedTile(SDL_Surface *dst, Uint16 mx, Uint16 my, Uint16 tile)
00527 {
00528  m_Tilemaps.at(1).drawTile( dst, mx, my, tile );
00529 }
00530 
00531 void CMap::animateAllTiles()
00532 {
00533  if(!m_animation_enabled)
00534   return;
00535 
00536  // Let the animation timer tick!!
00537  m_animtiletimer++;
00538 
00539  // Go throught the list and just draw all the tiles that need to be animated
00540  Uint32 num_h_tiles = mp_scrollsurface->h/16;
00541  Uint32 num_v_tiles = mp_scrollsurface->w/16;
00542 
00543  if(num_v_tiles+m_mapx >= m_width)
00544   num_v_tiles = m_width-m_mapx;
00545 
00546  if(num_h_tiles+m_mapy >= m_height)
00547   num_h_tiles = m_height-m_mapy;
00548 
00549  std::vector<CTileProperties> &frontTileProperties =
00550    g_pBehaviorEngine->getTileProperties(1);
00551  word *p_front_tile = m_Plane[1].getMapDataPtr();
00552 
00553  if(m_Background)
00554  {
00555   std::vector<CTileProperties> &backTileProperties =
00556     g_pBehaviorEngine->getTileProperties(0);
00557   word *p_back_tile = m_Plane[0].getMapDataPtr();
00558   for( size_t y=0 ; y<m_height ; y++)
00559   {
00560    for( size_t x=0 ; x<m_width ; x++)
00561    {
00562     bool draw = false;
00563 
00564     CTileProperties &back_tile = backTileProperties[*p_back_tile];
00565     if( back_tile.animationtime && (m_animtiletimer % back_tile.animationtime == 0) )
00566     {
00567      *p_back_tile += back_tile.nextTile;
00568      draw = true;
00569     }
00570     p_back_tile++;
00571 
00572 
00573     CTileProperties &front_tile = frontTileProperties[*p_front_tile];
00574     if( front_tile.animationtime && (m_animtiletimer % front_tile.animationtime == 0) )
00575     {
00576      *p_front_tile += front_tile.nextTile;
00577      draw = true;
00578     }
00579     p_front_tile++;
00580 
00581     if( draw && x >= m_mapx && y >= m_mapy &&
00582       x < m_mapx + num_v_tiles && y < m_mapy + num_h_tiles   )
00583     {
00584      Uint16 bg = m_Plane[0].getMapDataAt(x,y);
00585      Uint16 fg = m_Plane[1].getMapDataAt(x,y);
00586      const Uint16 loc_x = (((x-m_mapx)<<4)+m_mapxstripepos)&511;
00587      const Uint16 loc_y = (((y-m_mapy)<<4)+m_mapystripepos)&511;
00588      m_Tilemaps.at(0).drawTile(mp_scrollsurface, loc_x, loc_y, bg);
00589      if(fg)
00590       m_Tilemaps.at(1).drawTile(mp_scrollsurface, loc_x, loc_y, fg);
00591     }
00592    }
00593   }
00594  }
00595  else
00596  {
00597   for( size_t y=0 ; y<m_height ; y++)
00598   {
00599    for( size_t x=0 ; x<m_width ; x++)
00600    {
00601     bool draw = false;
00602 
00603     CTileProperties &front_tile = frontTileProperties[*p_front_tile];
00604     if( front_tile.animationtime && (m_animtiletimer % front_tile.animationtime == 0) )
00605     {
00606      *p_front_tile += front_tile.nextTile;
00607      draw = true;
00608     }
00609     p_front_tile++;
00610 
00611     if( draw && x >= m_mapx && y >= m_mapy &&
00612       x < m_mapx + num_v_tiles && y < m_mapy + num_h_tiles   )
00613     {
00614      Uint16 fg = m_Plane[1].getMapDataAt(x,y);
00615      const Uint16 loc_x = (((x-m_mapx)<<4)+m_mapxstripepos)&511;
